title: The ULTRA Budget PS5 Setup...
description: *Sponsor* Thank you be quiet! Check out the new DARK ROCK PRO 5:  and DARK ROCK ELITE:  CPU coolers from be quiet!  I bought a whole PS5 Gaming setup for $313.  Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
